channel.title: DevOps on Jinos Blog
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on Jinos Blog

item.title: What a DevOps Engineer Does?
item.description: Eye opened for a new day again? Well, wish you all a good day. Most DevOps professional once was a systems administrator. Definitely, not neccessary. I have seen guys jumping from developer field to DevOps. I started my career as a systems administrator in NELUX TECHNOLOGIES and after 6 months I jumped to the post of “build and release engineer”. In AMITI SOFTWARE TECHNOLOGIES I now work as a DevOps support engineer.
